DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to measure prothrombin time (PT) on an experimental device and a commercially available device on persons receiving coumadin (warfarin)treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Test the Accuracy of a Prototype Handheld PT/INR Device
DOC.detailed_description: This study will require participants to have up to 2 finger-punctures taken and sample tested on a strip and meter system for both the experimental and commercially available devices.
DOC.criteria: Currently taking coumadin (warfarin) Aged 18 years or older Able and willing to provide informed consent Can understand (read and write) English
